project.name: mtbvang-devhost
project.description: Test and build the puppet module. Note all test related targets need to be run from within the vagrant virtual machine.

target.name: default
target.description: Prints out available targets in this project.

target.name: build-init
target.description: Initialization tasks

target.name: build-clean
target.description: Removes the build dir.

target.name: test-bootstrap
target.description: Downloads the boostrap script from github and runs it in the build directory to provision the machine.

target.name: test-bootstrap-local
target.description: Runs the boostrap script from with the local parameter which uses the local files instead of github.

target.name: test-smoke
target.description: Tests the devhost class by running up the vagrant testing VM and provisioning with puppet.

exec.command: vagrant destroy -f smoketest && vagrant up smoketest

target.name: bundle-install
target.description: Installs the gems decleared in the Gemfile.

target.name: test-integration
target.description: Runs the Beaker acceptance tests. Requires the gems isntalled by target bundle-install.

target.name: puppet-apply
target.description: Does a puppet apply of the devhost class to the machine that this build script is run from.

target.name: librarian-puppet-update
target.description: Runs librarian-puppet update. Only runs if option.modules.update property is set to any value e.g. -Doption.modules.update=true.

target.name: librarian-puppet-install
target.description: Runs librarian-puppet install

target.name: vagrant-up-all
target.description: Starts all machines in the correct order.

target.name: vagrant-halt-all
target.description: Halts all machines in the correct order.

target.name: vagrant-rebuild-all
target.description: Rebuilds all machines in the correct order.

target.name: vagrant-destroy-all
target.description: Destroys all machines in the correct order.

target.name: vagrant-reload-all
target.description: Restarts all machines in the correct order.

target.name: vagrant-rebuild
target.description: Vagrant destroy and up of dev testing machine.

target.name: vagrant-destroy
target.description: Vagrant destroy the dev testing machine.

target.name: vagrant-up
target.description: Vagrant up the dev testing machine.

target.name: vagrant-provision
target.description: Vagrant up the dev testing machine.

target.name: vagrant-export-ssh-config
target.description: Dumps the vagrant ssh configs to ssh-config file.

target.name: docker-inspect
target.description: Gets the specified attribute value for the specified container. A container id or name must be passed in using option.container.id argument and a formate string e.g. .NetworkSettings.IPAddress using option.inspect.format argument.

target.name: docker-container-ip
target.description: Gets the IP for the specified container. A container id must be passed in using option.container.id argument.
